protein.general_function: Involved in heat shock protein binding
protein.specific_function: May act as a co-chaperone in iron-sulfur cluster assembly in mitochondria

reference.reference_text: Sun G, Gargus JJ, Ta DT, Vickery LE: Identification of a novel candidate gene in the iron-sulfur pathway implicated in ataxia-susceptibility: human gene encoding HscB, a J-type co-chaperone. J Hum Genet. 2003;48(8):415-9. Epub 2003 Aug 19.
